website_summaries.verdict: The best way to keep a whole family meal hot for multi-person events.
pros: Large, soft bag has enough space for big meals like casseroles
Heating plate is powerful enough to cook food right inside the bag
Will heat or reheat food for hours when plugged in
cons: Too large to realistically use as an individual lunch box during daily meals

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Warmer works great my first trial was oatmeal with a flat-bottomed food storage plate from Ocean State Job Lots for $3 a piece. Oatmeal came out piping hot, the warming hot plate was hot to the touch. You May want to leave your plate lid cracked so it can breathe when you heat your food, otherwise the Heat and the back suction might ruin your lid.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: A large to go with my mini
customer_reviews.text: I have had the mini and I love it at work. The larger one is great too, doesnt heat up as fast as the mini, which makes send since a larger surfce area. Still this is great if you can get it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for busy folks!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I put frozen vegetables, raw chicken thighs, and a green curry simmer sauce before I left for work. When I got home, dinner was ready! The vegetables were not mushy and overcooked. The chicken was moist! Just wish it came in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Elien Migallen

customer_reviews.title: Great heat casseroles
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I purchased the 9x13 hotlogic because we have potluck dinners at least once a month at work. I brought in a half steam table aluminum pan with hash brown casserole that I cooked the night before and refridgerated. Carried it in cold. Plugged the oven in 2 hours before lunch. It was heated completely thru with our any drying out or scratching on the bottom. Since I used the disposable pan clean up was throwing the empty pan out.
customer_reviews.author: Jean C

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It functions as advertised. Doesn't dry out the food when heating for long periods. Easy to use. Easy to clean. I'm loving it. I use the hot plate without the case all the time to keep breakfast warm. My only recommendation is to use the OXO glass containers with snap on lids for foods with a lot of liquid. The pyrex lids are not always tight enough to stop leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for home and RV
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Have used it many times at home and in our RV and have been very pleased with how welll it works. Can cook meat from frozen or heat up leftovers. So glad I got the larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: I love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Yes yes this keep the food nice and warm. It does not over cook the food. But don't keep food in it for so long like 12 hours because that will over do it. I use this in my car when I'm traveling with food I want to keep warm. I would recommend it because it is a good product. I also purchase the small to. This is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Young

customer_reviews.title: Great for massage therapists!
customer_reviews.text: I do outcall massage, and this guy works great for hot stones and hot towels, there is no temp gauge so time your use accordingly, to give your stones time to cool off for use. I have the smaller one too, works just as great but I got the bigger one so I can heat more stuff at once. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vee Cee

customer_reviews.title: A crockpot without the pot
customer_reviews.text: An excellent portable oven. I used it several times cooking tv dinners and frozen lasagna. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neat Product!
customer_reviews.text: This gadget works great for on the road truck drivers. I normally use it to heat leftovers from the night before, and they taste freshly made. I do wish it came with a pan like the "mini version".
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend and love the sturdy design
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a snow trip and it worked amazingly. Used a battery bank that has a standard wall plug to extend the time it would remain hot for a few more hours. Highly recommend and love the sturdy design.
customer_reviews.author: Albert M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this portable oven
customer_reviews.text: I love this portable oven. I can bring a dish to work and anywhere such as potluck and the food stays warm as I can plug it in our car.
customer_reviews.author: NERLITA ENCELA

customer_reviews.title: Hot Logic Family Size Portable Oven**** LOVE IT~
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Use it almost every day. Best invention ever!
customer_reviews.author: CBPfromTN

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: It has worked great for us. I travel most days for work and I wished I had found this a decade ago. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: So glad that this finally came in a larger size. Love it
customer_reviews.author: MC.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love Hot Logic. I use it at home, work and in the car. Having food cooking in the car and ready when I arrive somewhre is great!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect when you want to take something hot to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect when you want to take something hot to the office or sports event (tennis matches) and the crock pot won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. So nice not to have to heat up the kitchen, but still get home baked taste.
customer_reviews.author: EMC

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great
customer_reviews.text: I’m a truck driver and this thing is great. I can have hot healthy meals on the road
customer_reviews.author: Paul Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Great on a rig!
customer_reviews.text: It works amazing, especially working on an ambulance. My partner and I can have a hot meal anytime. 10/10 would recommend to anyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling . Bought frozen food family size and just plug it in at night . .., you have a delicious meal at breakfast!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Vegan is easy
customer_reviews.text: Im on the road in my service van, plug it in 2 hours before dinner for warm ups nothing but steam when you pop that top. Use it 5 times a week, soild.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have for working people.
customer_reviews.text: This product is unbelievable. It really works and it's the best heating item that cooks food tasting better than heating stuff in the microwave. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hot Logic has changed the way I eat when traveling. This is absolutely genius!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Traveler
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It is so nice to be able to travel and eat your own food.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is a Truck Driver and he loves it !
customer_reviews.author: brianna

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The concept is really cool. but we don't use it as often as we thought we would.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Lemos

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was able to be used in the car. More for at the office.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: for heating things up and not having to worry about burning or forgetting - THESE ARE GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Cookable from scratch??? Took 12-13 hours to cook a green bean casserole. BUT, for heating things up and not having to worry about burning or forgetting - THESE ARE GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: avid buyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cool product! Perfect for people like me who travel often.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I got the family-sized model and I love it so far.
customer_reviews.text: I got the family-sized model and I love it so far. I bought a pyrex container separately and have used it several times; I have also cooked frozen items (lasagna and such) in the cardboard containers that they came in. No sweat either way. The family-sized model is red and black, a nice combination of colors. Jim Update April 27, 2017 Cans, with contents, heat nicely. Get self-opening (pop-top?) cans so you don't have to fiddle with a hot can with a can opener. Jim
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Came without insulation on inside like the Minis
customer_reviews.text: Came without insulation on inside like the Minis. Will not retain heat without insulation. Waiting to hear back from company. Their Intro Video clearly shows a well insulated 9 x 13.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bigger version of the mini. It does take a little longer to cook dishes since it has a larger surface area, but it cooks the food perfectly! I love putting a frozen lasagna from Costco in the Pyrex 9x13 baking dish that comes out perfect within 8 hours and almost everyone says it's the best lasagna they have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Officer1984

customer_reviews.title: Will be handy for tailgating!!
customer_reviews.text: This Hot Logic is going to come in very handy for tailgating! I have used the smaller sized one, so I expect this will work as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

product_meta.title: HOTLOGIC Food Warming Tote, Casserole Carrier 120V, Red
